roles.name: Washerwoman
roles.ability: Start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a specific Townsfolk.

roles.name: Librarian
roles.ability: Start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a specific Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

roles.name: Investigator
roles.ability: Start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a specific Minion.

roles.name: Chef
roles.ability: Start knowing how many pairs of evil players are neighbors.

roles.name: Empath
roles.ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

roles.name: Fortune Teller
roles.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is an arbitrary good player that registers as a Demon to you.

roles.name: Undertaker
roles.ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

roles.name: Monk
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

roles.name: Ravenkeeper
roles.ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

roles.name: Virgin
roles.ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

roles.name: Slayer
roles.ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

roles.name: Soldier
roles.ability: You are safe from the Demon.

roles.name: Mayor
roles.ability: If no one dies by execution, you might die instead.

roles.name: Butler
roles.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they vote too.

roles.name: Drunk
roles.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but you are not.

roles.name: Recluse
roles.ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

roles.name: Saint
roles.ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

roles.name: Poisoner
roles.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

roles.name: Spy
roles.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

roles.name: Scarlet Woman
roles.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travelers don't count)

roles.name: Baron
roles.ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

roles.name: Imp
roles.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
